Name Who?

Hi, I'm wangrongwei. I'm a 24 year old software engineer in Beijing. Welcome to my personal site! I like to swimming, play tennis, and tackle interesting problems.

My Promise

I believe in public accountability for my goals. So I am making a promise, right here, for all the world to see.

If I

read learn new things build something meet someone new exercise eat healthy sleep well help someone daily,

I will become a better person.
